about_detail_label: Smart Point Calculator & Daily Points Log
about_detail_line: App aimed to support and encourage people on Weight Watchers Plans.
help_line_1: 'Nutrition' - see Menu option - per 100g in EU, or per Serving Size in USA
help_line_2: 'Your Serving Size' - enter size in grams of your portion / serving size
help_line_3: 'Calories' - may be shown as 'Energy', pick the kcal value - normally enter the 'Per 100g' / serving size
help_line_4: 'Sat. Fat','Sugar ','Protein' - normally enter the 'Per 100g' / serving size
